solution_line_template: Ahmed has scored {ahmed_current_total_points} total points in the class thus far because {num_assignments} x {ahmed_current_grade} = <<{num_assignments}*{ahmed_current_grade}={ahmed_current_total_points}>>{ahmed_current_total_points}

Emily had scored {emily_current_total_points} total points before the final assignments because {num_assignments} x {emily_current_grade} = <<{num_assignments}*{emily_current_grade}={emily_current_total_points}>>{emily_current_total_points}

She scored {emily_total_points_after_final} total points after the final assignment because {emily_current_total_points} + {emily_final_assignment_grade} = <<{emily_current_total_points}+{emily_final_assignment_grade}={emily_total_points_after_final}>>{emily_total_points_after_final}

Ahmed needs to score a {ahmed_grade_to_tie} to tie Emily for the semester because {emily_total_points_after_final} - {ahmed_current_total_points} = <<{emily_total_points_after_final}-{ahmed_current_total_points}={ahmed_grade_to_tie}>>{ahmed_grade_to_tie}

Ahmed needs to score a {ahmed_grade_to_beat} to beat Emily for the semester because {ahmed_grade_to_tie} + {one_point_more} = <<{ahmed_grade_to_tie}+{one_point_more}={ahmed_grade_to_beat}>>{ahmed_grade_to_beat}
